Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Table

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.Observable<ResponseMessage>
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Table
Direct Known Subclasses:
TableExpertMode
public class Table extends Observable<ResponseMessage>
Table Class for match control, represents the entire model

    • playAssistant

      public void playAssistant(Assistant card) throws GameException, AssistantNotFoundException
      plays the assistant card, puts it on top of the discard pile and calculates the order of action phase turn
      Parameters:
      card - assistant card to play
      Throws:
      GameException - if assistant card isn't playable (i.e. another one has played it)
      AssistantNotFoundException - if there isn't the assistant card
